channel.title: New Zealand Herald - Top Stories
channel.description: Latest Content for New Zealand Herald

item.title: Live: Quickest path to level 1 - Jacinda Ardern's plan to get NZ to near normal
item.description: VIRUS LATEST * 5.45m cases globally, with 345,000 deaths; NZ has just 27 active cases * 'Insanity': Passengers pile into Auckland train during after-school rush * Who gains and who misses out on new ...
item.author: newsfeeds@nzherald.co.nz

enclosure.url: https://media.nzherald.co.nz/webcontent/image/jpg/202022/SCCZEN_A49O5786_2020041444206095_70x70.jpg?media_subtype_id=16|caption=Jacinda Ardern says the low number of new cases has allowed the limit on gatherings to be eased. Photo / File

https://media.nzherald.co.nz/webcontent/image/jpg/202022/A_160520NZHBPLEVEL214_70x70.jpg?media_subtype_id=16|caption=The leap to much larger public gatherings has been called a "cause for concern". Photo / Brett Phibbs

https://media.nzherald.co.nz/webcontent/image/jpg/202022/SCCZEN_250520POOLPOSTCAB7_70x70.jpg?media_subtype_id=16|caption=Prime Minister Jacinda Ardern said NZ will be in alert level 2 for at least four more weeks and Cabinet will reassess on June 22. Photo / Pool

https://media.nzherald.co.nz/webcontent/image/jpg/202022/SCCZEN_250520POOLPOSTCAB8_70x70.jpg?media_subtype_id=16|caption=Director general of health Ashley Bloomfield said the number of Covid cases was so low that the limit on gatherings could jump straight to 100 from midday Friday. Photo / Pool

https://media.nzherald.co.nz/webcontent/image/jpg/202022/35801128_m_70x70.jpg?media_subtype_id=16|caption=Weddings, funerals, events and church services will all be allowed to have 100 people from midday Friday. Photo / 123RF

https://media.nzherald.co.nz/webcontent/image/jpg/202022/31047646_m_70x70.jpg?media_subtype_id=16|caption=Dancing at private events will be allowed from midday Friday, but not at public venues including bars and clubs. Photo / 123RF

item.title: 'Difficult and tragic': Man killed in Auckland workplace accident
item.description:
A man has died following a workplace accident last night.
The incident happened on Unity Drive in Rosedale, an industrial area on Auckland's North Shore.
It is understood the incident was at the Alto ...
item.author: newsfeeds@nzherald.co.nz

enclosure.url: https://media.nzherald.co.nz/webcontent/image/jpg/202022/SCCZEN_A_HBT132422-05_70x70.jpg?media_subtype_id=16|caption=Emergency services were called to the incident on Unity Drive around 7.35pm on Monday night. File photo / Glenn Taylor

item.title: Covid income relief: Who gains, who misses out
item.description:
